message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This product is truly exceptional and I believe you'll find it's worth every penny.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
